title: Cant create new account. Not a valid email?
body: Trying to make a new account and I'm using multiple valid emails and it continues to tell me none of them are valid... anyone?

replies.body:
The error received when signing up might not always be the most clear.  First and foremost, make sure that you're using an email that's not already registered to another account.  You can always change it back to one after the account has been created.

The username you're trying to use might also be in use already.

Finally, if your age is too low then you might be denied a sign up as there is a limit!

Let me know if that clears things up!
